entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
